changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS services ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, price_per_hour DECIMAL NOT NULL CHECK ( price_per_hour >= 0 ), slot TEXT NOT NULL CHECK ( 32 > LENGTH ( slot )), status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK ( 64 > LENGTH ( status )), created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, deleted_at TIMESTAMPTZ, service_provider_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES service_providers ( id ), UNIQUE ( slot, service_provider_id ) );
